1106.name: 309 LSi Tig
1106.Applications: Buffer layers before hard facing, dissimilar joints between ferritic and austenitic steels and or difficult to weld steels.
1106.Suitable_For: Buffer layers before hard facing, dissimilar joints between ferritic and austenitic steels and or difficult to weld steels such as: 42CrMo4, C45, 42MnV7, tool steels etc.
